name: Connect 4 Game Hub
description: Play Connect 4 and other board games with friends in Discord voice channels!
author: Your Name
summary: A multiplayer Connect 4 game designed specifically for Discord voice channels

description_localizations.en-US: Play Connect 4 and other board games with friends in Discord voice channels!
description_localizations.es-ES: ¡Juega Connect 4 y otros juegos de mesa con amigos en canales de voz de Discord!
description_localizations.fr: Jouez à Connect 4 et à d'autres jeux de société avec des amis dans les canaux vocaux Discord !
description_localizations.de: Spiele Connect 4 und andere Brettspiele mit Freunden in Discord-Sprachkanälen!
description_localizations.it: Gioca a Connect 4 e altri giochi da tavolo con amici nei canali vocali di Discord!
description_localizations.pt-BR: Jogue Connect 4 e outros jogos de tabuleiro com amigos em canais de voz do Discord!
description_localizations.ja: Discordのボイスチャンネルで友達とConnect 4やその他のボードゲームをプレイしましょう！
description_localizations.ko: Discord 음성 채널에서 친구들과 Connect 4 및 기타 보드 게임을 플레이하세요!
description_localizations.zh-CN: 在Discord语音频道中与朋友一起玩Connect 4和其他棋盘游戏！
description_localizations.zh-TW: 在Discord語音頻道中與朋友一起玩Connect 4和其他棋盤遊戲！

summary_localizations.en-US: A multiplayer Connect 4 game designed specifically for Discord voice channels
summary_localizations.es-ES: Un juego multijugador de Connect 4 diseñado específicamente para canales de voz de Discord
summary_localizations.fr: Un jeu Connect 4 multijoueur conçu spécifiquement pour les canaux vocaux Discord
summary_localizations.de: Ein Multiplayer-Connect-4-Spiel, das speziell für Discord-Sprachkanäle entwickelt wurde
summary_localizations.it: Un gioco Connect 4 multigiocatore progettato specificamente per i canali vocali di Discord
summary_localizations.pt-BR: Um jogo multijogador Connect 4 projetado especificamente para canais de voz do Discord
summary_localizations.ja: Discordのボイスチャンネル専用に設計されたマルチプレイヤーConnect 4ゲーム
summary_localizations.ko: Discord 음성 채널을 위해 특별히 설계된 멀티플레이어 Connect 4 게임
summary_localizations.zh-CN: 专为Discord语音频道设计的多人在线Connect 4游戏
summary_localizations.zh-TW: 專為Discord語音頻道設計的多人在線Connect 4遊戲
